column4: Incorporated into Edinburgh in 1920.  Originally the port city.

This is an island in the Cape Verde Islands.  More research will be necessary to determine where on the island the consul was posted - but probably was Praia (the largest city).

These are the coordinates for Georgetown the capital city of modern day Guyana - which is located in the Demerara-Mahaica region.  More research is needed to pinpoint the officer's location.
These are the coordinates for Sao Luis - the capital city of the Brazilian state of Maranhao - located on Sao Luis island.  More research is required.
Probably should change the name to Recife - which is the city.  Pernambuco is the region.
